text: Harbour Villages is an electoral ward of Chichester District, West Sussex, England and returns three members to sit on Chichester District Council. Following a district boundary review, Harbour Villages was created from the Bosham, Donnington, Fishbourne and Southbourne wards in 2019. ==Councillor== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="4"|Year!!Member!!Party!!Member!!Party!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | || style="background-color: " | || style="background-color: " | |2019 |Adrian Moss ||Liberal Democrat |David Rodgers ||Liberal Democrat |Penelope Plant ||Conservative |} ==Election results== ==References== ==External links== * Chichester District Council * Election Maps Category:Wards of Chichester District
title: Harbour Villages
